document.full_text: in separate articles, times reporters write of mounting student loan debt, tips on pursuing an alternate path (community college, at least for a few years) and those colleges offering admission to some applicants who agree to attend college elsewhere first.
document.title: roundup: rising loan debt; community college option; admission, with conditions
